description: '''Time Crash''' was a [[Time Lord rock]] group from Chicago.  The band formed between June 2011 and June 2012 following a Facebook post by vocalist Ronen Kohn.  The concept of the band was inspired by [[wizard rock]] and bands like [[Harry and the Potters]].  Time Crash's first EP was recorded in July 2012 and their live debut was in September 2012.
